name: Kendo UI
tag_list: html5, jquery, jquery-ui, javascript, jquery-frameworks, web-development, html5-ui
overview:
Kendo UI - the way of HTML5. Kendo UI is a jQuery-based app development framework which provides developers with everything they need to build mobile websites, web apps, interactive data visualizations and native-like applications.

Kendo UI is built on top of jQuery and leverages the power of with HTML5, CSS3 & Javascript.

Kendo UI features a robust framework, jQuery UI widgets, DataSource, validation, internationalization, a MVVM framework, easily customizable templates, rich themes and Kendo UI Server-side wrappers for ASP.NET MVC (C# ad VB).

The team behind Kendo UI caters to the evolution of the most comprehensive HTML5, Javascript framework for modern web and mobile app development.The productivity of jQuery developers is usually hindered by assembling disparate Javascript libraries and plug-ins. Kendo UI is all-in one solution for professional HTML5 development.
